svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Mean versus median monthly per capita expenditure (or income), 2014
For countries for which the per capita consumption expenditure is not available income is shown instead. Both
measures are adjusted for price differences over time (expressed in 2011 prices) and are adjusted for price
differences between countries (expressed in international dollars).
